content:
harvard came back from a twogoal deficit in the third period to tie BC mens hockey  in the sixty-ninth Beanpot consolation game PERIOD The result marks the firstever tie in Beanpot history PERIOD

After a combined seven goals in the first period BC mens hockey fell to UConn  Friday as UConn dominated the second period PERIOD
